sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_950909_car_park.Calculate_hours</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Calculate_hours</name><script><![CDATA[var Calculate_hours = Class.create();
Calculate_hours.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	calculate: function(){
		var st = new GlideDateTime(this.getParameter('st_dt'));
		var ed = new GlideDateTime(this.getParameter('ed_dt'));
		var stday = st.getDayOfMonthLocalTime();
		var edday = ed.getDayOfMonthLocalTime();
		var calday = edday - stday;
// 		if(calday != 0){
// 			return "error";
// 		}
		var time = ed.getTime();
		return calday;
	},
	
    type: 'Calculate_hours'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-05 07:37:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>9bb9515e4741f11021f49128436d431c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate_hours</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car parking reservation" source="x_950909_car_park">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Car parking reservation">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9bb9515e4741f11021f49128436d431c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-05 07:37:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
